characters.name: Kazuto Kirigaya
characters.description:
__Height:__ 172 cm
__Weapon(s) of choice:__ Anneal Blade (1st Level), Queen's Knightblade (9th Level), Elucidator (50th level) and Dark Repulser (forged by Lisbeth)

Kirito is a "solo" player, a player who hasn't joined a guild and usually works alone. He is also one of the very few people to have had the privilege to play in the beta testing period of Sword Art Online. His game alias, Kirito, is created by taking the syllables of the first and last Kanji of his real last and first names respectively: (Kirigaya Kazuto). 

In the real world, he lives with his mother and younger sister in a family of 3.  When Kayaba announced the start of the death game, he is surprised, but unlike everyone else he quickly gets over it and accepts it to an extent. He invited his friend Klein to go with him but Klein had to find his friends in the game. He was invited to join them but he declined as he couldn't take the pressure of protecting them even with his beta testing knowledge of the game.

characters.name: Asuna Yuuki
alt_names: Berserker Healer (バーサクヒーラー)
characters.description:
__Height:__ 160-168 cm
__Weapons of choice:__ Wind Fleuret (1st Floor), Lambent Light (Forged by Lisbeth)

Asuna is a friend of Kirito and is a sub-leader of the guild Knights of the Blood (KoB), a medium-sized guild of about thirty players, also called the strongest guild in Aincrad. Being one of the few girls that are in SAO, and even more so that she's extremely pretty, she receives many invitations and proposals. She is a skilled player earning the title "Lightning Flash" for her extraordinary sword skill that is lightning fast. Her game alias is the same as her real world name.

characters.name: Suguha Kirigaya
characters.description: [Kazuto](https://anilist.co/character/36765)'s sister in the real world. She is 15 years old and in her third year of junior high, as well as a member of the Kendou club. She's a diligent worker and has been practicing Kendou for 8 years.    ~!In the VRMMO game *Alfheim Online*, she is known as Leafa, a Sylph fairy. She stumbled onto Kazuto by accident one night and decided to travel with him to the World Tree. She eventually fell in love with him because he showed that he really loves playing VR games as if living in it and is very honest in everything. In the real world she slowly got closer to her brother (actually a cousin) but because they're family and because he already got [Asuna](https://anilist.co/character/36828) as a girlfriend she decided to give up on him and fall in love with Kazuto instead. But soon afterwards she realized that they're the same person. After being convinced by Kazuto to have a fierce duel which ended up in them flying in each others' arms, she decided to help Kazuto in rescuing Asuna.!~

characters.name: Akihiko Kayaba
characters.description:
Director and creator of the Nerve Gear and *Sword Art Online*. He traps all the players within *Sword Art Online* by using the Nerve Gear to cease sending signals to the users' body. Any attempt of removal, loss of power for a certain period, or if the user dies in the game will also kill the user. His motivation is to observe what happens after he traps them.   

~!He is in fact Heathcliff in the game *SAO*, who is the leader of the guild Knights of Blood.!~

characters.name: Ryoutarou Tsuboi
characters.description:
A friendly player that meets Kirito at the start of the game and quickly befriends and learns from him. He and Kirito later separate because he has friends who were also new to the game so he couldn't leave them. He survives for the past two years and managed to protect his friends the whole time, something Kirito regretted not doing. He is a katana user and the leader of the small guild Fuurinkazan who participates in the boss battles.  As one of the few people close to Kirito, he always keeps him in check and wants Kirito to survive the game.  He chose the Salamader race on ALO   

~! In the side story Caliber, he fell in love at first sight with the girl on the cage named Freyja and agreed that he will help her find her tribe's treasure which is a hammer, though the decision still remains to be a team's decision. The team said yes on Caliber and it turned out that the girl they saved was Thor. It was revealed that Thor disguised as a beautiful girl to get close to Giant King Þrym and retrieve his hammer. Thor defeated Giant King Þrym and that stopped the medallion from being corrupted and ending the quest. !~

characters.name: Shouzou Yuuki
characters.description: Asuna's father. He is a CEO of a major electronics manufacturing company.

characters.name: Midori Kirigaya
characters.description: Kirito and Suguha's mother in the real world. After Kazuto got trapped she went to the hospital two months prior to lean by Kazuto's side, eyes brimming with tears and smile bright with gladness that he was still alive.

characters.name: Keiko Ayano
characters.description: She is a middle level dagger user. She is a very cheerful and sweet girl. She has a very rare familiar, a feathery dragon that she named Pina after her cat in the real world. She treasured Pina a lot and was the reason she survived in the game. Aside from being a female player, she is also a Beast Tamer and thus perceived as an idol amongst the middle level players. She received endless invitations from parties and guilds who wanted an idol player to join them to get more fame. Because of the attention she got, she became overly proud of herself and left a party one time after a misunderstanding. She got surrounded by monsters and lost Pina in the end. She was then rescued by Kirito who was passing by and helped her to resurrect the dead familiar.

characters.name: Yui
characters.description: A young and cheerful girl with long black hair who looks no older than 10 years old. [Kirito](https://anilist.co/character/36765) and [Asuna](https://anilist.co/character/36828) found her in a forest on the 22nd floor of Aincrad. ~!Her true identity is actually a players' self-regulation program for mental maintenance, Mental Health Counseling Program or MHCP. After being forbidden by the game master [Akihiko Kayaba](https://anilist.co/character/36829) to come close to the players at the beginning of the death game, she was flooded with errors and broke down. In the process she became an AI that possesses actual intelligence. When the Cardinal system governing *Sword Art Online* decided to erase her, Kirito turned her into a tear shaped crystal pendant. He actually converted her to a part of environmental data for the client program and was saved to his NerveGear's local memory.!~  ~!In *ALfheim Online*, she was able to return to her normal form because ALO was based on a copy of the SAO server. She supports Kirito there as a Navigation Pixie. Kirito and Asuna still treat her as their daughter.!~

characters.name: Rika Shinozaki
characters.description:
A mace wielder that runs a blacksmith shop in Aincrad on the 48th floor. She made [Asuna](https://anilist.co/character/36828)’s rapier ‘Lament Light’ and one day got a request from [Kirito](https://anilist.co/character/36765) to make him a sword with similar or better quality than his one handed long sword ‘Elucidator’ that he got from a monster drop. She told him that if she had the right materials she could make weapons that would break any sword, so they formed a party and went on a journey to find the material she needed. Because of that journey she came to the conclusion that she felt lonely and yearned for warmth. In ALO she is Leprechaun race blacksmith. 

~!She comes to realize that she loves Kirito but after finding out that the one Asuna had feelings for was in fact Kirito she decided to give up on him despite how she feels so Asuna could express her feelings, however during the moments after Kirito's victory and SAO's announcement that the game has been cleared she shouts at the top of her lungs that she loves Kirito and that she will meet him again in the real world, which after the ALO incident she actually does, going to school with him and Asuna.!~

characters.name: Andrew Gilbert Mills
alt_names: アンドリュー・ギルバート・ミルズ
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180cm

A merchant stationed at city Algate, located at the 50th floor of Aincrad. His shop motto is "Buy cheap and sell cheap". He is a very strong axe-wielding warrior in the frontlines.  Kirito sometimes stays in his shop as sort of a disaster shelter, which he gets annoyed with but later ignores as Asuna also visits, which results in some publicity for his shop.   

~!In the real world he is married and owns a Bar called Dicey Cafe!~   

~!In the side story Aria in the Starless Night, he is among the few players who participated in the first floor boss fight and supported Kirito when he knew of the latter's status as a beta tester and later called a Beater. !~   

~!Upon returning to the real world he helps Kirito implement Kayaba's "seed" which allows VR games to be easier accessed throughout the world, also vastly decreasing the large licensing cost that companies would pay in servers.!~

characters.name: Sachi
characters.description: A member of the guild «Black Cats of the Full Moon». All the members are actually computer research club members from the same high school in the real world except Kirito. She uses a two-handed long spear and her level is rather low compared to the rest of the guild members. She never intended to leave the Starting City but she did, knowing that she probably would die because she is afraid of monsters. According to Kirito, she and him are a lot alike and are both socially awkward, wall themselves in from people but fear loneliness.

characters.name: Keita
characters.description: He is the leader of the guild Black Cats of the Full Moon he and the other members (not including Kirito) are actually computer research club members from the same high school in the real world.   ~!One day, Keita went to buy a little house as their guild home and after he got back Kirito told him all the other members died after they got attacked by monsters. Keita then ran out of the town in Aincrad, and jumped over a fence without hesitation committing suicide by jumping in the endless void.!~

characters.name: Diavel
characters.description:
A player with a kite shield and proclaims himself to be a knight. He was the one who organized the first meeting of players to form a raid party to take on the first floor boss. He organized the participating players well into groups according to their specialty and displayed great leadership to motivate and lead the raid party. 

~!He is also a beta tester of Sword Art Online but pretended to be a newbie player to escape the wrath of the players against them.!~

characters.name: Kibaou
characters.description:
One of the 10,000 players trapped in Sword Art Online. Kibaou is the leader of the Aincrad Liberation Squad, one of SAO's first major clearing guilds alongside [Lind](https://anilist.co/character/284250)'s Dragon Knights Brigade.

~!In the aftermath of the disastrous 25th Floor battle, Kibaou retires from the front lines due to his guild suffering severe losses, which resulted in their merging with [Thinker](https://anilist.co/character/70681/Thinker)'s guild, MMO Today. This eventually became the Aincrad Liberation Force, of which Kibaou was a sub-leader.!~

characters.name: Kuradeel
characters.description: A member of the guild Knights of the Blood assigned to protect Asuna.   ~!He was later revealed to be a member of the famous Player Killer guild, Laughing Coffin. He later tried to kill Kirito by setting a trap and killing three of the guild members. He was later stopped by Asuna and killed by Kirito because Asuna can't kill him.!~

characters.name: Tomo Hosaka
characters.description:
Argo "The Rat" serves as an information broker and courier in the Sword Art Online death game. Kirito and Argo suspect each-other without doubt to be a fellow beta testers but refuses to ever confirm the topic. As a broker she is known to sell any information for any price, including the story of her mysterious trademark whiskers. While she sells information to some at occasionally hefty prices, she is also known the be the author of free guide books situated in most town shops to help beginners. 

~!Argo's whiskers were originally drawn on to learn the "Martial Arts" skill during the beta test. Unable to complete the quest before beta testing ended, they became her trademark and source of her nickname.!~

characters.name: Caynz
characters.description:
A player who was killed inside a city, which is said to be impossible as there is a protection code preventing players to lose HP inside the city area.    

~!His name is written as Caynz but Yoruko gave a false name Kains to Kirito and Asuna to throw them off. There was a person with the same name who died in a Piercing DoT(damage over time) a year before the inside the area incident. They based their plan with this information and matched the time of death with the time the real Kains died.!~   

~!He is part of the guild Golden Apple. It got disbanded when their guild leader Griselda died. He and his friend Yoruko suspected that there was someone from the guild who killed the guild leader for the rare item they picked up earlier. They proceeded to do a plan to scare the culprit into confessing in the makeshift grave of the leader by making it that the guild leader rose from the dead and starts to kill the guild members inside the city.!~

characters.name: Yolko
characters.description:
A close friend of Caynz and the one who first screamed when the inside area incident occurred.   

~!She is part of the guild Golden Apple. It got disbanded when their guild leader Griselda died. Shee and her friend Caynz suspected that there was someone from the guild who killed the guild leader for the rare item they picked up earlier. They proceeded to do a plan to scare the culprit into confessing in the makeshift grave of the leader by making it that the guild leader rose from the dead and starts to kill the guild members inside the city.!~

characters.name: Godfree
characters.description: He was one of the 10,000 players who got trapped in the death game Sword Art Online. He was part of the guild Knights of the Blood.    ~!He was killed by Kuradeel, during his revenge against Kirito.!~

characters.name: Sasha
characters.description:
She resides in the first floor and takes care of the younger players. She lives with them in a church, where they hide from the members of the Army.

(Source: SAO Wiki)

characters.name: Yulier
characters.description:
Yuriel is a silver haired whip user who is part of the Aincrad Liberation Force. She is devoted to aiding Thinker with his duties.   She seeks the aid of Asuna and Kirito after she heard that two strong players from higher floors had come to the first floor. Thinker had been trapped by Kibaou in a hidden high-level dungeon that had recently opened up below the first floor. After journeying with Kirito and Asuna to the center of the floor, she grabs Thinker and is told by Kirito to escape with a teleport crystal.

(Source: SAO Wiki)

characters.name: Thinker
characters.description:
He is trapped in the dungeon under the Black Iron Castle by a faction leader named Kibaou. He is later rescued by Kirito and Asuna in during the Morning Dew Girl arc events after he was thrown into a hidden dungeon.  

(Source: SAO Wiki)

characters.name: Vassago Casals
characters.description:
Leader and founder of the red guild "Laughing Coffin", known for his large knife and catch phrase "It's show time."  His guild was later destroyed by other players in SAO, but his whereabouts are missing. He is presumed to be alive because he wasn't listed as one of the dead players.  

(Source: SAO Wiki)

characters.name: Atsushi Kanamoto
alt_names: Johnny Black (ジョニー・ブラック)
characters.description: Johnny Black was a survivor of Sword Art Online, he's a member of the infamous red guild Laughing Coffin and is partnered with Xaxa. He is well known for using poisons and such in battles.

characters.name: Rosalia
characters.description: Rosalia is the leader of the orange guild Titan's Hand, she was caught by Kirito and sent to the prison managed by The Army.  As the leader of the guild, and in order to maintain her "green" status, she looks for victims and lures the players to a place where the other members of the guild attack and loot the player, while she maintains her «green cursor» to avoid suspicion.  (Source: SAO Wiki)

characters.name: Nobuyuki Sugou
characters.description: Originally selected by Asuna's father to marry Asuna, he was adopted into her family on her father's wishes. He attended the same school with Kayaba Akihiko, who he viewed as a rival. During the Sword Art Online incident, he took advantage of the chaos to steal test subjects for research along with Asuna. In ALfheim Online he adopts the persona Fairy King Oberon  As the Fairy King Oberon, he keeps Asuna locked up in a bird cage at the top of the World Tree. In the real world, he confronts the powerless Kazuto by voicing his intentions of wedding the unconscious Asuna. While keeping Asuna locked up in ALO, he constantly visited her just to fool around with her. From his actions, one could say that he is a pervert.    ~!After Kirito manages to ascend the World Tree, Oberon and Kirito have a devastating fight. By using his system commands, Oberon is able to completely dominate Kirito. Fortunately, Kayaba Akihiko saves Kirito by overriding Oberon's authority. Then, in the real world, Sugou attempts to kill Kirito when he is running to Asuna's hospital. This backfired and ended up with him going to prison.!~

characters.name: Schmitt
characters.description: Schmitt is a lancer of the Divine Dragon Alliance and a former member of the Golden Apple.

characters.name: Tetsuo
characters.description:
Tetsuo was the member of the «Black Cats of the Full Moon», a small guild in «Sword Art Online». He is a mace user and the forward of the guild. He was killed along with most of his guild when a trap was triggered that called multiple monsters and prevented the use of crystals.

(Source: SAO Wiki)

characters.name: Sasamaru
characters.description:
Sasamaru was the member of the «Black Cats of the Full Moon», a small guild in «Sword Art Online». He was killed along with most of his guild when a trap was triggered that called multiple monsters and prevented the use of crystals.

(Source: SAO Wiki)

characters.name: Ducker
characters.description:
Ducker is a member of the «Black Cats of the Full Moon», a small guild in «Sword Art Online». He's a dagger user. 

~!He was killed along with most of his guild when a trap was triggered that called multiple monsters and prevented the use of crystals.!~

characters.name: Grimlock
characters.description: Grimlock is a player in Sword Art Online and a former member of the guild Golden Apple.    ~!He was the culprit of his in-game and real-life wife, Griselda's death. He killed her because he didn't like the changes in her personality. At first he didn't want to aid Caynz and Yolko in their plans to catch Griselda's killer by forging them weapons to use in the in-AREA murders. Evenutally he did, but not with good intentions. He helped so he could have Caynz, Yolko and Scmitt together and get them killed with the help of the Laughing Coffin. But the plan failed, because Kirito came to the rescue. He is caught by Asuna. It is unknown to what happened to him in the remaining time of SAO, but in the end, he was logged out.!~ (Source: Sword Art Online Wikia)

characters.name: Nishida
characters.description: Nishida is one of the oldest players in Sword Art Online. In the game, he is a fisherman, but in reality, he works for the Tohto Broadband Connection, a network operator company that runs SAO. He was in charge of maintaining the network connection before being trapped in the game.   (Source: SAO Wiki)

characters.name: Shinichi Nagata
characters.description: He is Lyfa's friend and mentor in ALfheim Online. He is skilled in concealment and high level dark magic.  He harbors a crush on Suguha, being her classmate in real life. He is key in investigating the Salamander's infiltration of the Sylph, and uncovering Sigurd's plot. He later rejoins Kirito and Lyfa at Aarun, and urges Lyfa to leave and return to Sylvain, after he finds her upset. Later he confesses to her and ends up getting punched. After Lyfa returns from meeting Kirito again, she informs them they are attacking the World Tree.   ~!During the World Tree assault, Recon breaks off and attracts multiple guardians, and later uses high level dark magic called Sacrifice to self-destruct, which entails a higher death penalty. This action buys enough time for Sylph and Cait Sith reinforcements to arrive.!~ (Source: SAO Wiki)

characters.name: Kagemune
characters.description: Kagemune is the Lance Group captain for the Salamanders.  He led a group on a mission, to attempt to steal money and items from Lyfa and Recon. They managed to kill Recon but Lyfa escaped and they met Kirito. Kirito killed the two of his team members and left him alive after realizing he can't beat him.   ~! He helped Kirito on his lie about him being the ambassador of the Undine-Spriggan Union by lying to Eugene that Kirito had an Undine Ally when his teammates were killed by him. !~

characters.name: Kobatz
characters.description: Cobert is a lieutenant-colonel in the Aincrad Liberation Force in Sword Art Online. He has a gung ho attitude. He drives his men to their limits, giving them no rest.   ~!He was killed by The Gleam Eyes after his party entered the boss room without any major preparations.!~ (Source: Sword Art Online Wiki)

characters.name: Alicia Rue
characters.description: Alicia Rue is the leader of the Cait Sith. She was elected by popular vote. She is also training her dark magic capable of using Moonlight Mirror. She forms an alliance with the Sylphs to finish the Conquer the World Tree Quest.    ~!During the meeting with Sylph , the groups are attacked by Salamanders lead by General Eugene. Kirito dives in to save the day and fights off Eugene although Kirito has inferior equipment.  Later, along with Sylph reinforcements, she aid Kirito's ascension of the World Tree after using collected funds to purchase armor of at least Ancient grade for all of her warriors.!~ (Source: SAO Wiki)

characters.name: Eugene
characters.description: General Eugene is the head of the Salamander armed forces.   ~!He was considered the strongest player in ALfheim Online until he was defeated by Kirito during the Conference of the Lords.!~ (Source: SAO Wiki)

characters.name: Sigurd
characters.description: Sigurd is a Sylph warrior in the VRMMORPG «ALfheim Online». He lost to Lyfa in the Sylph tournament yet he still retained high ambitions to hold power among the Sylph. He later tries to betray the Sylph to the Salamander. He is later caught and exiled by Sakuya, after the botched assassination attempt.   (Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Sakuya
characters.description: Leader of the Sylph race and an exceptional swordswoman. She was elected as the leader of the Sylph race by popular vote (80% voice of the vote). Her statistics are not very high due to her status as a Lord not allowing her to do much training. Despite her low stats, she is a formidable opponent in the Sylph dueling tournaments.    ~!During a meeting with the Cait Sith, she is attacked by Salamanders led by General Eugene. At the same moment, Kirito flies in to challenge the intruder to a duel. After Kirito wins the battle, she attempts to seduce him along with Alicia Rue. Lyfa smothers their attempt, saying that he is accompanying her to the World Tree. At the end of the arc, Lady Sakuya leads a combined force of Cait Sith and Sylph against the World Tree in an attempt to aid Kirito along his journey.!~ (Source: SAO Wiki)

characters.name: Gtacs
characters.description: Gtacs is a powerful mage and the leader of a Salamanders Mage Group.

characters.name: Pina
characters.description: is Silica's Feathered Little Dragon and the first known monster to be tamed in Sword Art Online. It understands Silica's commands and will protect her in any way it can, as it is her «Tamed Monster». It is also present in ALfheim Online as her Cait Sith familiar.

characters.name: Daizen
characters.description: is the finance chief of the Knights of the Brotherhood of Blood guild in Sword Art Online.

characters.name: Griselda
characters.description: She was one of the 10,000 players who were trapped in Sword Art Online, the leader of the «Golden Apple» guild before its dissolution, and the wife of Grimlock both in-game and in the real world.

characters.name: Shivata
characters.description: One of the 10,000 players trapped in Sword Art Online. A member of the Dragon Knights Brigade and, later, the Divine Dragon Alliance. He and [Liten](https://anilist.co/character/280880/Liten) fell in love with each other during their time throughout Aincrad.

characters.name: Lind
characters.description: Lind is one of the 10,000 players initially trapped in Sword Art Online. He sees himself as [Diavel](https://anilist.co/character/65169/Diavel)'s successor and thus founds the Dragon Knights Brigade, one of the two major clearing guilds early in the game alongside [Kibaou](https://anilist.co/character/65171/Kibaou)'s Aincrad Liberation Squad.
